name: GERMA 66
text: [Main] You may discard a character with 4000 or less power and the {Germa 66} type from your hand: If the number of DON!! cards on your board is equal to or less than your opponent's, play a character card from your trash that has 5000 to 7000 power and the same name as the discarded card.

effect.text: You may discard a character with 4000 or less power and the {Germa 66} type from your hand: If the number of DON!! cards on your board is equal to or less than your opponent's, play a character card from your trash that has 5000 to 7000 power and the same name as the discarded card.
